remarks: Lemma for ~ irrapx1 .  Two multiples in the same bucket means they are very close mod 1.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2014.)
statement:
irrapxlem2 $p |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. NN ) -> E. x e. ( 0 ... B ) E. y e. ( 0 ... B ) ( x < y /\ ( abs ` ( ( ( A x. x ) mod 1 ) - ( ( A x. y ) mod 1 ) ) ) < ( 1 / B ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
